rows._xml: <entry><id>https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/cokwr</id><updated>2015-09-15T23:38:21.911Z</updated><category scheme='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006' term='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006#list'/><title type='text'>Industry Engagement</title><content type='text'>text: The Magic Lab is a leader in disruptive innovation with exceptional expertise and capabilities in advanced technologies including robotics, human-robot interaction, smart connected cars, Internet of all things, and software engineering. We are team-oriented and our people have designed and developed significant systems that have been deployed on earth and in the larger solar system e.g. International Space Station and the Hubble Space Station. We can work with you on developing new business models, startups, new advanced technologies and to develop an understanding of their implications.</content><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/cokwr'/><gsx:section>Industry Engagement</gsx:section><gsx:text>The Magic Lab is a leader in disruptive innovation with exceptional expertise and capabilities in advanced technologies including robotics, human-robot interaction, smart connected cars, Internet of all things, and software engineering. We are team-oriented and our people have designed and developed significant systems that have been deployed on earth and in the larger solar system e.g. International Space Station and the Hubble Space Station. We can work with you on developing new business models, startups, new advanced technologies and to develop an understanding of their implications.</gsx:text></entry>
rows.title: Industry Engagement
rows.text: The Magic Lab is a leader in disruptive innovation with exceptional expertise and capabilities in advanced technologies including robotics, human-robot interaction, smart connected cars, Internet of all things, and software engineering. We are team-oriented and our people have designed and developed significant systems that have been deployed on earth and in the larger solar system e.g. International Space Station and the Hubble Space Station. We can work with you on developing new business models, startups, new advanced technologies and to develop an understanding of their implications.

rows._xml:
<entry><id>https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/cpzh4</id><updated>2015-09-15T23:38:21.911Z</updated><category scheme='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006' term='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006#list'/><title type='text'>PhD Information</title><content type='text'>text: Our laboratory is an exciting place for you to learn about how technology can be used to drive transformation and to develop your entrepreneurial capabilities for innovation. Our lab has state-of-the-art technologies and know-how, advanced technologies and we strive for innovative high-impact outcomes. By doing a PhD in the lab, you will have access to our global research network while working with enthusiastic and friendly researchers who will help you to become a world-leader in technology-led innovaitont. Our past students have started their own business e.g. [Leafcutter](http://leafcutter.com.au), led innovation at places like Google, Telstra, Apple, IBM, Atlassian, Macquarie Bank, Amazon, CBA, Animal Logic, CSIRO, Visual Risk, ASX, Cochlear. They have also remained close friends and ongoing collaborators. You can find some of them on our [People page](people.html).


 </content><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/cpzh4'/><gsx:section>PhD Information</gsx:section><gsx:text>Our laboratory is an exciting place for you to learn about how technology can be used to drive transformation and to develop your entrepreneurial capabilities for innovation. Our lab has state-of-the-art technologies and know-how, advanced technologies and we strive for innovative high-impact outcomes. By doing a PhD in the lab, you will have access to our global research network while working with enthusiastic and friendly researchers who will help you to become a world-leader in technology-led innovaitont. Our past students have started their own business e.g. [Leafcutter](http://leafcutter.com.au), led innovation at places like Google, Telstra, Apple, IBM, Atlassian, Macquarie Bank, Amazon, CBA, Animal Logic, CSIRO, Visual Risk, ASX, Cochlear. They have also remained close friends and ongoing collaborators. You can find some of them on our [People page](people.html).


 </gsx:text></entry>
rows.title: PhD Information
rows.text: Our laboratory is an exciting place for you to learn about how technology can be used to drive transformation and to develop your entrepreneurial capabilities for innovation. Our lab has state-of-the-art technologies and know-how, advanced technologies and we strive for innovative high-impact outcomes. By doing a PhD in the lab, you will have access to our global research network while working with enthusiastic and friendly researchers who will help you to become a world-leader in technology-led innovaitont. Our past students have started their own business e.g. [Leafcutter](http://leafcutter.com.au), led innovation at places like Google, Telstra, Apple, IBM, Atlassian, Macquarie Bank, Amazon, CBA, Animal Logic, CSIRO, Visual Risk, ASX, Cochlear. They have also remained close friends and ongoing collaborators. You can find some of them on our [People page](people.html).

rows._xml: <entry><id>https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/cre1l</id><updated>2015-09-15T23:38:21.911Z</updated><category scheme='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006' term='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006#list'/><title type='text'>PhD Information</title><content type='text'>text: Our former students have founded new businesses and secured exciting jobs as creative leaders of innovaiton in university and industry, pushing the boundaries of human knowledge and making a difference to society. We hope to help you reach your goals too.</content><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/cre1l'/><gsx:section>PhD Information</gsx:section><gsx:text>Our former students have founded new businesses and secured exciting jobs as creative leaders of innovaiton in university and industry, pushing the boundaries of human knowledge and making a difference to society. We hope to help you reach your goals too.</gsx:text></entry>
rows.title: PhD Information
rows.text: Our former students have founded new businesses and secured exciting jobs as creative leaders of innovaiton in university and industry, pushing the boundaries of human knowledge and making a difference to society. We hope to help you reach your goals too.

rows._xml: <entry><id>https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/chk2m</id><updated>2015-09-15T23:38:21.911Z</updated><category scheme='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006' term='http://schemas.google.com/spreadsheets/2006#list'/><title type='text'>PhD Information</title><content type='text'>text: We are looking for passionate and innovative students who will contribute to the life and scholarship of The Magic Lab. The ideal student simply has a creative and curious mind with analytical reasoning skills and an ability to adapt and learn independently. You do not need to be a programmer, computer scientist, engineer, roboticist, lawyer or mathematician. However, talent in one (or more) of these areas will provide a great foundation from which to launch your next life adventure!</content><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1onlrprRlJbrsMw9GCxTGQO-tYqlKfZP3jBaCRaWDLd0/oa54iwa/public/values/chk2m'/><gsx:section>PhD Information</gsx:section><gsx:text>We are looking for passionate and innovative students who will contribute to the life and scholarship of The Magic Lab. The ideal student simply has a creative and curious mind with analytical reasoning skills and an ability to adapt and learn independently. You do not need to be a programmer, computer scientist, engineer, roboticist, lawyer or mathematician. However, talent in one (or more) of these areas will provide a great foundation from which to launch your next life adventure!</gsx:text></entry>
rows.title: PhD Information
rows.text: We are looking for passionate and innovative students who will contribute to the life and scholarship of The Magic Lab. The ideal student simply has a creative and curious mind with analytical reasoning skills and an ability to adapt and learn independently. You do not need to be a programmer, computer scientist, engineer, roboticist, lawyer or mathematician. However, talent in one (or more) of these areas will provide a great foundation from which to launch your next life adventure!
